channel.title: 667 Rsps using on Eclipse Sdk!
channel.description: Hey there i am having problem with doing this thing. I whana use eclipse sdk program to code the source alot easyer, but i am having some issues while i try to run the source on it. To run launcher u use right thing but it dont start to run my source and i am sure that all people who uses it can use it on the eclipse . Can some one tell me how to run it right way so it work on eclipse please?

item.title: 667 Rsps using on Eclipse Sdk!
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

If you go to run configurations (right click on project), you can set your main class (which will mostly likely be org.Server or something similar). Then go to the arguments tab, and in the VM arguments field, put -Xmx512m (this allocates some memory to your server).

Depending on your source you may have to import your xpp3 and x-stream.jars, which should be in a lib or libs folder within your server project. Simply navigate to them via “Add External Libraries” and “Remove” the duplicates. If they are marked with a red cross then you need to set their external path. If you have already imported them and they still have a red cross, remove them.

Let me know how you get on. What’s the source?

Read full topic
